Keeping teaching methods fresh is integral to getting students engaged in their studies and educational videos are a fantastic way of achieving this. These are designed with primary input from educators and curriculum developers, or shown in educational research to be an effective learning tool.

EDUzap, an educational platform providing video lectures through Youtube channels, social media for open discussions, space for expressing creativity through channel Blog. Offering effective learning programs for competitive aspirants and engineering students. Teaching methods implemented prior to primary input from educational professionals and curriculum developers.
